com.monk.spi

Interface MonitoringBackend

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CSV, Influx, Prometheus

    public interface MonitoringBackend
    Created by ahatzold on 26.07.2017 in project monk_project.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeConnection()
      This method closes the connection, if one has been established before.
      void establishConnection(java.lang.String connectionString, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This method establishes a connection to the monitoring backend by generating an individual object depending on the backend.
      void pushSinglePoint(java.lang.String measurement, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> fields, java.lang.String timestamp, java.lang.String extra)
      This method pushes a single point to the monitoring backend using the connection established before.

    • Method Detail

      • closeConnection

        void closeConnection()
        This method closes the connection, if one has been established before.

      • establishConnection

        void establishConnection(java.lang.String connectionString,
                         java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        This method establishes a connection to the monitoring backend by generating an individual object depending on the backend. The connectionString can contain additional params (for further monitoring backends) called 'extra', which are separated by '$'.
        Parameters:
        connectionString - The connection string to use
        username - The username to establish the connection
        password - The password to establish the connection

      • pushSinglePoint

        void pushSinglePoint(java.lang.String measurement,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> fields,
                     java.lang.String timestamp,
                     java.lang.String extra)
        This method pushes a single point to the monitoring backend using the connection established before.
        Parameters:
        measurement - The measurement to use in the database
        fields - The fields to save
        timestamp - The timestamp of this point
        extra - Additional information
